subject: Simsonn plus x pedals throttle / clutch calibration issues
description_text:
Hello, I just recently ordered the simsonn plus x pedals and they arrived
today, they were working perfectly fine then i updated the firmware and
followed instructions during the update in the simsonn manager, and the
throttle and clutch pedals both only read halfway (throttle reads to 43
percent) and clutch reads to about 50 percent when fully depressed. I have
tried grounding wires, restarting and reinstalling multiple different
versions of the software, and even the usb controller configuration menus
through windows to no avail, I am hoping its just a software issue and not
hardware.

Thanks for your help.

conversations.body_text: Hi UROUTT T,  Please click the Offset button first, then follow the steps in the pop-up window to zero the raw (white) pedal signal to 0%. After that, recalibrate the pedals: press each of the three pedals fully during the calibration process, then click Save. If the blue progress bar moves smoothly from 0% to 100% during the pedal test, the calibration is successful and you can proceed to bind the pedals in the game.Â
